D F G I M N P R S T U W

D

dontStrip(char) - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
Explicitly writes and does not strip the character argument.

F

FileRedirection - class unit.FileRedirection.
Just a helper class, that allows simple inclusion of files into the output of a UniT.
FileRedirection() - Constructor for class unit.FileRedirection
 

G

getHiddenException() - Method in class unit.NestedException
Returns the original exception, that is encapsulated within this exception.
getToken() - Method in class unit.Interpreter
Returns the input token that lead to the construction of this parse tree node.

I

initialize(Token) - Method in class unit.Interpreter
Saves a reference to the token.
initializeForExecution() - Method in class unit.Interpreter
Prepares the interpreter for execution and must be called before run().
interprete(String) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses and executes a UniT template, the resulting output will be send to System.out.
interprete(String, Hashtable, Writer) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses and executes a UniT template, the resulting output will be send to the out Writer object.
interpreteAndHandleExceptions(String) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses and executes a UniT template.
interpreteAndHandleExceptions(String, Hashtable, Writer, Writer) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses and executes a UniT template.
Interpreter - class unit.Interpreter.
This is the UniT parse tree and interpreter in one class that is derived from the parser tree node implementation of ANTLR, i.e., the result of the UniT parser is a parser tree of objects of this class which will be directly used for execution.
Interpreter() - Constructor for class unit.Interpreter
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Interpretes (parses and executes) a UniT template given as first parameter at the command line, catches all exceptions and directs standard and error output to the console.

N

NestedException - exception unit.NestedException.
Due to its inheritance from UniTRuntimeException, this class needs not to be declared and can be used to encapsulate any exception, that is not derived from UniTRuntimeException.
newline() - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
Explicitly writes and does not strip a newline character sequence (default encoding: System.getProperty("line.separator")).

P

parseUniT(Reader, String) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses a UniT template from a character stream.
parseUniTFile(String) - Static method in class unit.UniT
Parses a UniT template with the specified file name and the default encoding.

R

redirectFileToWriter(String, Writer) - Static method in class unit.FileRedirection
Opens a file specified by the passed name and directs its content to the passed Writer object, that could be the predefined out object of UniT.
run(Hashtable) - Method in class unit.Interpreter
Processes the whole UniT template and must be called after initializeForExecution().

S

space() - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
Explicitly writes and does not strip a space character.

T

tab() - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
Explicitly writes and does not strip a tab character.

U

UnexpectedException - exception unit.UnexpectedException.
All exceptions, that are not explicitly thrown, e.g.
UniT - class unit.UniT.
This class provides some methods to easily interprete (parse and execute) UniT templates.
UniT() - Constructor for class unit.UniT
 
UniTRuntimeException - exception unit.UniTRuntimeException.
All exceptions, that will be explicitly thrown at runtime within the UniT interpreter, are of this type.
UserException - exception unit.UserException.
An encapsulated exception, thrown by the user.

W

WhiteSpaceStripper - class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper.
Replaces all sequences of white space characters (space, tab, newline and carriage return) by one space character.
WhiteSpaceStripper(Writer) - Constructor for class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
Creates a new white space filter.
write(char[], int, int) - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
 
write(int) - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
 
write(String, int, int) - Method in class unit.WhiteSpaceStripper
